If you cannot control your impulses, your emotions, as you may desire, you can control the will, and thus an entire change will be wrought in your life. When you yield up your will to Christ, your life is hid with Christ in God. It is allied to the power which is above all principalities and powers. You have a strength from God that 

124 

holds you fast to His strength; and a new life, even the life of faith, is possible to you.--CTBH 148 (ML 318.)
